basic.description: This course focuses on plate tectonics and earth structure. Current methodsof probing the interior: seismology and seismic tomography, geomagnetics, geoid and gravity, geochemistry and geochronology. Heat flow, mantle convection, core convection and the geodynamo.
basic.subject: GLY
basic.title: Introduction to Geophysics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MAP 2302, PHY 2049, or instructor permission.
